Christopher Perusse, Bessemerâ€™s director of information technology, is based in the New York office. He joined the firm in 2008 and is responsible for all aspects of IT project management, strategy, systems, and operations.

Christopher has over 14 years of IT experience, 11 of which have been dedicated to private equity. His IT expertise lies in the areas of data storage, business continuity, and global network architecture. Prior to joining Bessemer, Christopher managed IT operations and engineering at Audax Group, and worked as a senior network infrastructure engineer at Bain Capital, helping the firm expand its global footprint into several Asian markets. Most recently, Christopher has been leading strategic, cloud adoption initiatives for core Bessemer systems.
